issue.title: [Developer] Add option to auto-create JIRA issue for PRs which don't have it
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11804](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11804). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Improve dev workflow by automatically creating JIRA tickets if requested, as discussed here;
https://lists.apache.org/thread.html/rd4533c7f882adbfc51061aceafebe8d84ea194fa5108d6cebc3621e1%40%3Cdev.arrow.apache.org%3E

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11804?focusedCommentId=17320911) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
We failed to reach consensus that this idea did more good than harm to the JIRA workflow so closing this ticket
